nodes.text: Nuyu's was a tattoo shop owned by Nuyu, a male Lafrarian. The owner of the shop made a fairly good living selling cosmetic body alterations to the pirates and mercenaries that frequented the space station StarForge Station, which Nuyu's was located on. In existence by 0 ABY, the shop was located in the market on StarForge Station.

Nuyu's first appeared in Preparing for War, an adventure scenario from 1998's The Far Orbit Project, by Timothy S. O'Brien. The book was a supplement to West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game and was a sequel of sorts to the previous publication, Pirates & Privateers, carrying on that book's theme by following the privateering vessel Far Orbit. The shop is provided as an example of the stores in the market that players can shop at when the Far Orbit goes to StarForge Station.
